roo.description: The best free models to get started

landing.introduction: Generate, refactor, and debug code with AI assistance. Check out our <docsLink>documentation</docsLink> to learn more.

modes.title: Customizable Modes
modes.description: Specialized personas with their own behaviors and assigned models

orchestration.title: Task Orchestration
orchestration.description: Split tasks into smaller, manageable parts

landing.accountMention: To get started, create your Datacoves Copilot Cloud account. Get powerful models, web control, analytics, support and more.

providerSignup.heading: Choose your provider
providerSignup.chooseProvider: Copilot needs an LLM provider to work. Choose one to get started, you can add more later.
providerSignup.rooCloudDescription: The easiest way to start is with the Datacoves Copilot Cloud Provider: a curated mix of free and paid models at a low cost.
providerSignup.useAnotherProviderDescription: Enter an API key and get going.
providerSignup.noApiKeys: Don't want to deal with API keys and separate accounts?
providerSignup.backToRoo: Go with the Datacoves Copilot Cloud Provider.

waitingForCloud.heading: Logging into Datacoves Copilot Cloud...
waitingForCloud.description: We'll take you to your browser to sign up for Datacoves Copilot Cloud. We'll then bring you back here to finish.
waitingForCloud.noPrompt: If you don't get prompted to open a URL, <clickHere>click here</clickHere>.
waitingForCloud.havingTrouble: If you've completed sign up but are having trouble, <clickHere>click here</clickHere>.
waitingForCloud.pasteUrl: Paste the callback URL shown in your browser:
waitingForCloud.invalidURL: That doesn't look like a valid callback URL. Please copy what Datacoves Copilot Cloud is showing in your browser.

startRouter: We recommend using an LLM Router:
startCustom: Or you can bring your provider API key:

telemetry.helpImproveMessage: Datacoves Copilot collects error and usage data to help us fix bugs and improve the extension. This telemetry does not collect code, prompts or personal information. You can turn this off in <settingsLink>settings</settingsLink>.
